column4: Can somone pls advise me on the best way to go about syncing an iphone in 8.10 I have read some stuff on the subject..But wasn't sure if the way that u go about it may have changed slightly
I don't know about iPhones, but when I sync my ipod I use iTunes running under WINE.
I am sure there is a native way of doing it
Every time I have tried to use a native way it never works entirely right.
